QuestData.Title: Close the Deal
QuestData.Description: We have what the trappers want. Now it's up to us to sign them up with our side.$B$BTake the chest to a trapper named Ivan at the Aspen Grove Post, just north of here.$B$BIf all goes well, we'll have local woodsmen serving as scouts for the king's army in no time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Cedar Chest to Ivan at Aspen Grove Post.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! You recovered the Sc... you recovered the chest that the Horde stole from us. We thank you, $n.
